official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of JTE-451 Administered for 16 Weeks in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis (IMPACT-PS)
inclusion_criteria:
* Have had a history of moderate to severe plaque psoriasis for at least 6 months prior to Visit 1;
* Subjects with moderate to severe plaque psoriasis covering ≥10% body surface area (BSA), with a psoriasis area and severity index (PASI) ≥12 and static Physician's Global Assessment (sPGA) score ≥3 at Visit 1 and Visit 2
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
